response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, we're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while taking advantage of our current pricing flexibility. We're confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, contributing to your success and satisfaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 9500}
